difficultytweaker.main:
The command of the §lDifficulty Tweaker§r mod.
It allows you to change the values that are used on this mod's mixins as well as turn them on or off.
difficultytweaker.entity.bee: This command allows you to change the length of bees' poison.
difficultytweaker.entity.bee.length:
Sets the seconds that bees poison you for.
Default value: §l[18]§r
Current value: %s
difficultytweaker.entity.cavespider: This command allows you to change the length of cave spiders' poison.
difficultytweaker.entity.cavespider.leng:
Sets the seconds that cave spiders poison you for.
Default value: §l[15]§r
Current value: %s
difficultytweaker.entity.guardian: This command allows you to change parameters from the guardian mixin.
difficultytweaker.entity.guardian.value:
Sets the bonus damage for guardian laser before damage scaling.
Default value: §l[2.0]§r
Current value: %s
difficultytweaker.entity.mob:
This command allows you to change parameters of mobEntity mixins.
You can change the distance mobs are willing to fall & the probability of the method that decides the armor of mobs to return earlier.
TLDR: The lower this value is the more armor that mobs will spawn with.
difficultytweaker.entity.mob.armorprobab:
Sets the value used for the mob armor calculation.
Default value: §l[0.1]§r
Current value: %s
difficultytweaker.entity.mob.fall:
Sets the distance mobs are willing to fall in % from their max health (0-1).
Default value: §l[0.33]§r
Current value: %s
difficultytweaker.entity.phantom: This command allows you to change parameters from the phantom mixin.
difficultytweaker.entity.phantom.min:
Sets the minimum amount of phantoms that spawn in each group.
Forced to be smaller than the maximum value.
Default value: §l[1]§r
Current value: %s
difficultytweaker.entity.phantom.max:
Sets the maximum amount of phantoms that spawn in each group.
Forced to be bigger than the minimum value.
Default value: §l[2]§r
Current value: %s
difficultytweaker.entity.player: This command allows you to change the multiplier of damage taken by a player.
difficultytweaker.entity.player.multipli:
Sets the multiplier for damage taken by players.
Default value: §l[1.0]§r
Current value: %s
difficultytweaker.entity.projectile: This command allows you to change the extra damage value added to projectiles.
difficultytweaker.entity.projectile.dama:
Sets the bonus damage for projectiles.
Default value: §l[0.33]§r
Current value: %s
difficultytweaker.entity.skeleton: This command allows you to change values about skeletons.
difficultytweaker.entity.skeleton.cooldo:
Sets skeletons' cooldown.
Default value: §l[20]§r
Current value: %s
difficultytweaker.entity.skeleton.diverg:
Sets skeletons' arrows divergence.
Default value: §l[2]§r
Current value: %s
difficultytweaker.entity.witherskull: This command allows you to change length of wither skulls' wither effect.
difficultytweaker.entity.witherskull.len:
Sets the effect's length.
Default value: §l[40]§r
Current value: %s
difficultytweaker.entity.zombie: This command allows you to change probability of zombies spawning with weapons.
difficultytweaker.entity.zombie.chance:
Sets the chance.
Default value: §l[0.1]§r
Current value: %s
difficultytweaker.entity.zombievillager: This command allows you to change probability of villager turning into zombies
Sets the chance.
Default value: §l[1.0]§r
Current value: %s
difficultytweaker.world.clampedlocaldiff: This command allows you to change the parameters of the clamped local difficulty mixin.

The minimum limit for the clamp.
Default value: §l[2.0]§r
Current value: %s

The maximum limit for the clamp.
Default value: §l[4.0]§r
Current value: %s

The minimum value after clamp.
Default value: §l[0.0]§r
Current value: %s

The maximum value after clamp.
Default value: §l[1.0]§r
Current value: %s
difficultytweaker.world.fire: This command allows you to change the extra encouragement of fire.
difficultytweaker.world.fire.encourageme:
Sets the extra value of encouragement for fire before accounting for rain & environmental factors.
Default value: §l[61]§r
Current value: %s
difficultytweaker.world.localdifficulty: This command allows you to change the parameters of the local difficulty mixin.
Sets the starting value for the mixin.
Default value: §l[0.75]§r
Current value: %s

Sets the maximum clamping value of the day time factor for the mixin.
Default value: §l[1.0]§r
Current value: %s

Sets the maximum clamping value of the chunk factor for the mixin.
Default value: §l[1.0]§r
Current value: %s

Sets the value that the moon factor is multiplied by in the mixin.
Default value: §l[0.25]§r
Current value: %s
difficultytweaker.world.netherportal: This command allows you to change the probability of zombified piglin spawning on nether portals.
difficultytweaker.world.netherportal.pro:
Sets the probability of a zombified piglin spawning on a nether portal.
Default value: §l[3/2000]§r
Current value: %s
difficultytweaker.world.raid: This command allows you to change the number of waves that raids have (capped at 15).
difficultytweaker.world.raid.count:
Sets the amount of waves (capped to 15).
Default value: §l[7]§r
Current value: %s
difficultytweaker.active:
Activates and deactivates the mixin.
Default value: %s
Current value: %s
